"[4683-i]

" How ? "[4687-i]

" Why , "[4688-he] [he]4688-he said aridly ; " [I]4688-he have come all the way here to see [you]4687-i to - day ! But [I]4688-he started from [home]5850-home to go to [Casterbridge Fair]143-casterbridge fair , where [I]4688-he have undertaken to preach the Word from a waggon at half - past two this afternoon , and where all [the brethren]7488-the brethren are expecting [me]4688-he this minute . Here 's the announcement . "[4688-he]

[He]4688-he drew from [his]4688-he breast - pocket a poster whereon was printed the day , hour , and place of meeting , at which [he]4688-he , d'Urberville , would preach the Gospel as aforesaid .

" But how can [you]4688-he get there ? "[198-tess] said [Tess]198-tess , looking at the clock .

" [I]4687-i can not get [there]5839-there ! [I]4687-i have come here . "[4687-i]

" What , [you]4688-he have really arranged to preach , and - "[4687-i]

" [I]4687-i have arranged to preach , and [I]4687-i shall not be [there]5839-there - by reason of [my]4687-i burning desire to see [a woman whom [I]4687-i once despised]7491-a woman whom i once despised ! - No , by [my]4687-i word and truth , [I]4687-i never despised [you]198-tess ; if [I]4687-i had [I]4687-i should not love [you]198-tess now ! Why [I]4687-i did not despise [you]198-tess was on account of [your]198-tess being unsmirched in spite of all ; [you]198-tess withdrew [yourself]198-tess from [me]4687-i so quickly and resolutely when [you]198-tess saw the situation ; [you]198-tess did not remain at [my]4687-i pleasure ; so there was one petticoat in [the world]497-the world for whom [I]4687-i had no contempt , and [you]198-tess are [she]198-tess . But [you]198-tess may well despise [me]4687-i now ! [I]4687-i thought [I]4687-i worshipped on [the mountains]7493-the mountains , but [I]4687-i find [I]4687-i still serve in [the groves]7494-the groves ! Ha ! ha ! "[4687-i]

" O Alec d'Urberville ! what does this mean ? What have [I]4687-i done ! "[4687-i]

" Done ? "[4689-i] [he]4689-i said , with a soulless sneer in the word . " Nothing intentionally . But [you]198-tess have been the means - the innocent means - of [my]4689-i backsliding , as [they]7495-they call it . [I]4689-i ask [myself]4689-i , am [I]4689-i , indeed , one of [those ' servants of corruption ' who , ' after [they]7496-those ' servants of corruption ' who , ' after they have escaped the pollutions of the world have escaped the pollutions of [the world]497-the world]7496-those ' servants of corruption ' who , ' after they have escaped the pollutions of the world , are again entangled therein and overcome ' - whose latter end is worse than [their]7496-those ' servants of corruption ' who , ' after they have escaped the pollutions of the world beginning ? "[4689-i] [He]4689-i laid [his]4689-i hand on [her]4690-her shoulder . " [Tess]198-tess , [[my]4689-i girl]7498-my girl , [I]4689-i was on the way to , at least , social salvation till [I]4689-i saw [you]4690-her again ! "[4689-i] [he]4689-i said freakishly shaking [her]4690-her , as if [she]4690-her were [a child]1122-a child . " And why then have [you]4690-her tempted [me]4689-i ? [I]4689-i was firm as [a man]1337-a man could be till [I]4689-i saw those eyes and that mouth again - surely there never was such a maddening mouth since [Eve]303-eve 's ! "[4689-i] [His]4689-i voice sank , and a hot archness shot from [his]4689-i own black eyes . " [[You]198-tess temptress]7500-you temptress , [Tess]198-tess ; [[you]198-tess dear damned witch of [Babylon]272-babylon]7501-you dear damned witch of babylon - [I]4689-i could not resist [you]198-tess as soon as [I]4689-i met [you]198-tess again ! "[4689-i]

" [I]198-tess could n't help [your]4689-i seeing [me]198-tess again ! "[198-tess] said [Tess]198-tess , recoiling .

" [I]4689-i know it - [I]4689-i repeat that [I]4689-i do not blame [you]4689-i . But the fact remains . When [I]4689-i saw [you]4689-i ill - used on [the farm]7206-the farm that day [I]4689-i was nearly mad to think that [I]4689-i had no legal right to protect [you]4689-i - that [I]4689-i could not have it ; whilst [he]4689-i who has it seems to neglect [you]4689-i utterly ! "[4689-i]

" Do n't speak against [him]4689-i - [he]4689-i is absent ! "[198-tess] [she]198-tess cried in much excitement . " Treat [him]4689-i honourably - [he]4689-i has never wronged [you]4692-his ! O leave [[his]4689-i wife]819-his wife before any scandal spreads that may do harm to [his]4689-i honest name ! "[198-tess]

" [I]4692-his will - [I]4692-his will , "[4692-his] [he]4692-his said , like [a man awakening from a luring dream]4693-a man awakening from a luring dream . " [I]4692-his have broken [my]4692-his engagement to preach to [those poor drunken boobies]7504-those poor drunken boobies at the fair - it is the first time [I]4692-his have played such a practical joke . A month ago [I]4692-his should have been horrified at such a possibility . [I]4692-his 'll go away - to swear - and - ah , can [I]4692-his ! to keep away . "[4692-his] Then , suddenly : " One clasp , [Tessy]256-tessy - one ! Only for old friendship - "[4692-his]

" [I]4692-his am without defence . [Alec]367-alec d'urberville ! [A good man]6308-a good man 's honour is in [my]4692-his keeping - think - be ashamed ! "[4692-his]

" Pooh ! Well , yes - yes ! "[4692-his]

[He]4692-his clenched [his]4692-his lips , mortified with [himself]4692-his for [his]4692-his weakness . [His]4692-his eyes were equally barren of worldly and religious faith . The corpses of those old fitful passions which had lain inanimate amid the lines of [his]4692-his face ever since [his]4692-his reformation seemed to wake and come together as in a resurrection . [He]4692-his went out indeterminately .

Though [d'Urberville]230-d'urberville had declared that this breach of [his]4692-his engagement to - day was the simple backsliding of [a believer]7421-a believer , [Tess]198-tess 's words , as echoed from [Angel Clare]284-clare , had made a deep impression upon [him]4692-his , and continued to do so after [he]4692-his had left [her]198-tess . [He]4692-his moved on in silence , as if [his]4692-his energies were benumbed by the hitherto undreamt - of possibility that [his]4692-his position was untenable . Reason had had nothing to do with [his]4692-his whimsical conversion , which was perhaps the mere freak of [a careless man]4695-a careless man in search of a new sensation , and temporarily impressed by [[his]4692-his mother]6090-his mother 's death .

The drops of logic [Tess]198-tess had let fall into the sea of [his]4692-his enthusiasm served to chill its effervescence to stagnation . [He]4692-his said to [himself]4692-his , as [he]4692-his pondered again and again over the crystallized phrases that [she]198-tess had handed on to [him]4692-his , " [That clever fellow]7506-that clever fellow little thought that , by telling [her]198-tess those things , [he]4692-his might be paving [my]4692-his way back to [her]198-tess ! "[4692-his]

XLVII

It is the threshing of the last wheat - rick at [Flintcomb - Ash farm]126-flintcomb - ash . The dawn of the March morning is singularly inexpressive , and there is nothing to show where [the eastern horizon]4697-the eastern horizon lies . Against the twilight rises the trapezoidal top of the stack , which has stood forlornly here through the washing and bleaching of the wintry weather .

When [Izz Huett]312-izz and [Tess]198-tess arrived at the scene of operations only a rustling denoted that others had preceded [them]4698-them ; to which , as the light increased , there were presently added the silhouettes of [two men on [the summit]1160-the summit]4699-two men on the summit . [They]4699-two men on the summit were busily " unhaling "[4699-two men on the summit] the rick , that is , stripping off the thatch before beginning to throw down the sheaves ; and while this was in progress [Izz]312-izz and [Tess]198-tess , with [the other women]1702-the other women - workers , in [their]1702-the other women whitey - brown pinners , stood waiting and shivering , [Farmer Groby]406-farmer groby having insisted upon [their]4699-two men on the summit being on the spot thus early to get the job over if possible by the end of the day . Close under the eaves of the stack , and as yet barely visible , was the red tyrant that [the women]5900-the women had come to serve - a timber - framed construction , with straps and wheels appertaining - the threshing - machine which , whilst it was going , kept up a despotic demand upon the endurance of [their]4699-two men on the summit muscles and nerves .

A little way off there was [another indistinct figure]4703-another indistinct figure ; [this one black , with a sustained hiss that spoke of strength very much in reserve]4704-this one black , with a sustained hiss that spoke of strength very much in reserve . The long chimney running up beside an ash - tree , and the warmth which radiated from the spot , explained without the necessity of much daylight that here was the engine which was to act as [the primum mobile of [this little world]4706-this little world]4705-the primum mobile of this little world . By the engine stood [a dark , motionless being]4707-a dark , motionless being , [a sooty and grimy embodiment of tallness]4708-a sooty and grimy embodiment of tallness , in a sort of trance , with a heap of coals by [his]4707-a dark , motionless being side : it was [the engine - man]4709-the engine - man . The isolation of [his]4707-a dark , motionless being manner and colour lent [him]4707-a dark , motionless being the appearance of a creature from [Tophet]146-tophet , who had strayed into the pellucid smokelessness of [this region of yellow grain and pale soil]4710-this region of yellow grain and pale soil , with which [he]4707-a dark , motionless being had nothing in common , to amaze and to discompose [its aborigines]4711-its aborigines .

What [he]4707-a dark , motionless being looked [he]4707-a dark , motionless being felt . [He]4707-a dark , motionless being was in [the agricultural world]1710-the agricultural world , but not of it . [He]4707-a dark , motionless being served fire and smoke ; [these denizens of [the fields]498-the fields]4713-these denizens of the fields served vegetation , weather , frost , and sun . [He]4707-a dark , motionless being travelled with [his]4707-a dark , motionless being engine from [farm]4181-farm to [farm]4181-farm , from [county]4717-county to [county]4717-county , for as yet the steam threshing - machine was itinerant in [this part of [Wessex]37-wessex]4719-this part of wessex . [He]4707-a dark , motionless being spoke in a strange northern accent ; [his]4707-a dark , motionless being thoughts being turned inwards upon [himself]4707-a dark , motionless being , [his]4707-a dark , motionless being eye on [his]4707-a dark , motionless being iron charge , hardly perceiving the scenes around [him]4707-a dark , motionless being , and caring for [them]4720-them not at all : holding only strictly necessary intercourse with [the natives]4721-the natives , as if some ancient doom compelled [him]4707-a dark , motionless being to wander here against [his]4707-a dark , motionless being will in the service of [[his]4707-a dark , motionless being Plutonic master]4722-his plutonic master . The long strap which ran from the driving - wheel of [[his]4707-a dark , motionless being engine]4723-his engine to [the red thresher under the rick]4724-the red thresher under the rick was the sole tie - line between [agriculture]4725-agriculture and [him]4707-a dark , motionless being .

While [they]4726-they uncovered the sheaves [he]4707-a dark , motionless being stood apathetic beside [his]4707-a dark , motionless being portable repository of force , round whose hot blackness the morning air quivered . [He]4707-a dark , motionless being had nothing to do with preparatory labour . [His]4707-a dark , motionless being fire was waiting incandescent , [his]4707-a dark , motionless being steam was at high pressure , in a few seconds [he]4707-a dark , motionless being could make the long strap move at an invisible velocity . Beyond [its]4727-its extent the environment might be corn , straw , or chaos ; it was all the same to [him]4707-a dark , motionless being . If [any of [the autochthonous idlers]4729-the autochthonous idlers]4728-any of the autochthonous idlers asked [him]4707-a dark , motionless being what [he]4707-a dark , motionless being called [himself]4707-a dark , motionless being , [he]4707-a dark , motionless being replied shortly , " [an engineer]7507-an engineer . "[4707-a dark , motionless being]

[The rick]4730-the rick was unhaled by full daylight ; [the men]2919-the men then took [their]2919-the men places , [the women]5900-the women mounted , and the work began . [Farmer Groby]406-farmer groby - or , as [they]4733-they called [him]406-farmer groby , " [he]406-farmer groby "[406-farmer groby] - had arrived ere this , and by [his]406-farmer groby orders [Tess]198-tess was placed on the platform of the machine , close to [the man who fed it]4734-the man who fed it , [her]198-tess business being to untie every sheaf of corn handed on to [her]198-tess by [Izz Huett]312-izz , who stood next , but on the rick ; so that the feeder could seize it and spread it over the revolving drum , which whisked out every grain in one moment .

[They]4735-they were soon in full progress , after a preparatory hitch or two , which rejoiced the hearts of [those who hated machinery]4736-those who hated machinery . The work sped on till breakfast time , when the thresher was stopped for half an hour ; and on starting again after the meal the whole supplementary strength of [the farm]7206-the farm was thrown into the labour of constructing the straw - rick , which began to grow beside the stack of corn . A hasty lunch was eaten as [they]4735-they stood , without leaving [their]4735-they positions , and then another couple of hours brought [them]4735-they near to dinner - time ; the inexorable wheel continuing to spin , and the penetrating hum of the thresher to thrill to the very marrow [all who were near the revolving wire - cage]4738-all who were near the revolving wire - cage .

[The old men on the rising straw - rick]4739-the old men on the rising straw - rick talked of the past days when [they]4739-the old men on the rising straw - rick had been accustomed to thresh with flails on the oaken barn - floor ; when everything , even to winnowing , was effected by hand - labour , which , to [their]4739-the old men on the rising straw - rick thinking , though slow , produced better results . [Those , too , on the corn - rick]4740-those , too , on the corn - rick talked a little ; but [the perspiring ones at the machine]4741-the perspiring ones at the machine , including [Tess]198-tess , could not lighten [their]4741-the perspiring ones at the machine duties by the exchange of many words . It was the ceaselessness of the work which tried [her]198-tess so severely , and began to make [her]198-tess wish that [she]198-tess had never some to [Flintcomb - Ash]126-flintcomb - ash . [The women on the corn - rick]4742-the women on the corn - rick - [Marian]310-marian , who was one of [them]4735-they , in particular - could stop to drink ale or cold tea from the flagon now and then , or to exchange a few gossiping remarks while [they]4735-they wiped [their]4735-they faces or cleared the fragments of straw and husk from [their]4735-they clothing ; but for [Tess]198-tess there was no respite ; for , as the drum never stopped , [the man who fed it]4734-the man who fed it could not stop , and [she]310-marian , who had to supply [the man]1516-the man with untied sheaves , could not stop either , unless [Marian]310-marian changed places with [her]198-tess , which [she]198-tess sometimes did for half an hour in spite of [Groby]406-farmer groby 's objections that [she]198-tess was too slow - handed for a feeder .

For some probably economical reason it was usually [a woman who was chosen for this particular duty]4745-a woman who was chosen for this particular duty , and [Groby]406-farmer groby gave as [his]406-farmer groby motive in selecting [Tess]198-tess that [she]198-tess was one of [those who best combined strength with quickness in untying , and both with staying power]4746-those who best combined strength with quickness in untying , and both with staying power , and this may have been true . The hum of the thresher , which prevented speech , increased to a raving whenever the supply of corn fell short of the regular quantity . As [Tess]198-tess and [the man who fed]4747-the man who fed could never turn [their]4748-their heads [she]310-marian did not know that just before the dinner - hour [a person]4749-a person had come silently into [the field]610-the field by the gate , and had been standing under a second rick watching the scene and [Tess]198-tess in particular . [He]4749-a person was dressed in a tweed suit of fashionable pattern , and [he]4749-a person twirled a gay walking - cane .

" Who is that ? "[312-izz] said [Izz Huett]312-izz to [Marian]310-marian . [She]310-marian had at first addressed the inquiry to [Tess]198-tess , but [the latter]462-the latter could not hear it .

" [Somebody 's fancy - man]7508-somebody 's fancy - man , [I]310-marian s'pose , "[310-marian] said [Marian]310-marian laconically .

" [I]310-marian 'll lay a guinea [he]4749-a person 's after [Tess]198-tess . "[310-marian]

" O no . ' Tis [a ranter pa'son who 's been sniffing after [her]198-tess lately]7509-a ranter pa'son who 's been sniffing after her lately ; not [a dandy like this]7510-a dandy like this . "[310-marian]

" Well - this is [the same man]7511-the same man . "[310-marian]

" [The same man]7511-the same man as [the preacher]4519-the preacher ? But [he]7511-the same man 's quite different ! "[310-marian]

" [He]7511-the same man [hev]7511-the same man left off [his]7511-the same man black coat and white neckercher , and [hev]7511-the same man cut off [his]7511-the same man whiskers ; but [he]7511-the same man 's [the same man]7511-the same man for all that . "[310-marian]

" [D'ye]7515-d'ye really think so ? Then [I]310-marian 'll tell [her]198-tess , "[310-marian] said [Marian]310-marian .

" Do n't . [She]198-tess 'll see [him]7511-the same man soon enough , good - now . "[310-marian]

" Well , [I]310-marian do n't think it at all right for [him]7511-the same man to join [his]7511-the same man preaching to courting [a married woman]7516-a married woman , even though [[her]198-tess husband]791-her husband mid be abroad , and [she]198-tess , in a sense , [a widow]7518-a widow . "[310-marian]

" Oh - [he]7511-the same man can do [her]198-tess no harm , "[312-izz] said [Izz]312-izz drily . " [Her]198-tess mind can no more be heaved from that one place where it do bide than a stooded waggon from [the hole [he]7511-the same man 's in]7519-the hole he 's in . [Lord love ' ee]7520-lord love ' ee , neither court - paying , nor preaching , nor the seven thunders [themselves]7520-lord love ' ee , can wean [a woman]1028-a woman when ' twould be better for [her]1028-a woman that [she]1028-a woman should be weaned . "[312-izz]

Dinner - time came , and the whirling ceased ; whereupon [Tess]198-tess left [her]198-tess post , [her]198-tess knees trembling so wretchedly with the shaking of the machine that [she]198-tess could scarcely walk .

" [You]198-tess ought to het a quart o ' drink into ' ee , as [I]310-marian 've done , "[310-marian] said [Marian]310-marian . " [You]198-tess would n't look so white then . Why , souls above [us]7522-us , [your]198-tess face is as if [you]198-tess 'd been hagrode ! "[310-marian]

It occurred to the good - natured [Marian]310-marian that , as [Tess]198-tess was so tired , [her]198-tess discovery of [[her]198-tess visitor]4680-her visitor 's presence might have the bad effect of taking away [her]198-tess appetite ; and [Marian]310-marian was thinking of inducing [Tess]198-tess to descend by [a ladder on the further side of the stack]4753-a ladder on the further side of the stack when [the gentleman]1007-the gentleman came forward and looked up .

[Tess]198-tess uttered a short little " Oh ! "[1007-the gentleman] And a moment after [she]198-tess said , quickly , " [I]198-tess shall eat [my]198-tess dinner here - right on the rick . "[198-tess]

Sometimes , when [they]4755-they were so far from [[their]4755-they cottages]2024-their cottages , [they]4755-they all did this ; but as there was rather a keen wind going to - day , [Marian]310-marian and [the rest]6118-the rest descended , and sat under the straw - stack .

[The newcomer]804-the newcomer was , indeed , [Alec]367-alec d'urberville d'Urberville , [the late Evangelist]4759-the late evangelist , despite [his]4759-the late evangelist changed attire and aspect . It was obvious at a glance that [the original Weltlust]4760-the original weltlust had come back ; that [he]4759-the late evangelist had restored [himself]4759-the late evangelist , as nearly as [a man]1337-a man could do who had grown three or four years older , to the old jaunty , slapdash guise under which [Tess]198-tess had first known [[her]198-tess admirer]4762-her admirer , and [cousin so - called]4763-cousin so - called . Having decided to remain where [she]198-tess was , [Tess]198-tess sat down among the bundles , out of sight of the ground , and began [her]198-tess meal ; till , by - and - by , [she]198-tess heard footsteps on the ladder , and immediately after [Alec]367-alec d'urberville appeared upon the stack - now an oblong and level platform of sheaves . [He]4759-the late evangelist strode across them , and sat down opposite of [her]198-tess without a word .

[Tess]198-tess continued to eat [her]198-tess modest dinner , a slice of thick pancake which [she]198-tess had brought with [her]198-tess . [The other workfolk]4764-the other workfolk were by this time all gathered under the rick , where the loose straw formed a comfortable retreat .

" [I]4765-i am here again , as [you]198-tess see , "[4765-i] said d'Urberville .

" Why do [you]198-tess trouble [me]198-tess so ! "[198-tess] [she]198-tess cried , reproach flashing from [her]198-tess very finger - ends .

" [I]4765-i trouble [YOU]198-tess ? [I]4765-i think [I]4765-i may ask , why do [you]198-tess trouble [me]4765-i ? "[4765-i]

" Sure , [I]4765-i do n't trouble [you]198-tess any - when ! "[4765-i]

" [You]198-tess say [you]198-tess do n't ? But [you]198-tess do ! [You]198-tess haunt [me]4765-i . Those very eyes that [you]198-tess turned upon [my]4765-i with such a bitter flash a moment ago , [they]7523-they come to [me]4765-i just as [you]198-tess showed [them]7523-they then , in the night and in the day ! [Tess]198-tess , ever since [you]198-tess told [me]4765-i of [that child of ours]7524-that child of ours , it is just as if [my]4765-i feelings , which have been flowing in a strong puritanical stream , had suddenly found a way open in the direction of [you]198-tess , and had all at once gushed through . The religious channel is left dry forthwith ; and it is [you]198-tess who have done it ! "[4765-i]

[She]4765-i gazed in silence .

" What - [you]198-tess have given up [your]198-tess preaching entirely ? "[4765-i] [she]4765-i asked . [She]4765-i had gathered from [Angel]284-clare sufficient of the incredulity of modern thought to despise flash enthusiasm ; but , as [a woman]1028-a woman , [she]4765-i was somewhat appalled .

In affected severity [d'Urberville]4765-i continued -

" Entirely . [I]4767-i have broken every engagement since that afternoon [I]4767-i was to address [the drunkards at [Casterbridge Fair]143-casterbridge fair]7525-the drunkards at casterbridge fair . [The deuce]7526-the deuce only knows what [I]4767-i am thought of by [the brethren]7488-the brethren . Ah - ha ! [The brethren]7488-the brethren ! No doubt [they]7488-the brethren pray for [me]4767-i - weep for [me]4767-i ; for [they]7488-the brethren are [kind people]7529-kind people in [their]7488-the brethren way . But what do [I]4767-i care ? How could [I]4767-i go on with the thing when [I]4767-i had lost [my]4767-i faith in it ? - it would have been hypocrisy of the basest kind ! Among [them]7488-the brethren [I]4767-i should have stood like [Hymenaeus]410-hymenaeus and [Alexander]367-alec d'urberville , who were delivered over to [Satan]411-satan that [they]7488-the brethren might learn not to blaspheme . What a grand revenge [you]7530-you have taken ! [I]4767-i saw [you]7530-you innocent , and [I]4767-i deceived [you]7530-you . Four years after , [you]7530-you find [me]4767-i [a Christian enthusiast]7531-a christian enthusiast ; [you]7530-you then work upon [me]4767-i , perhaps to [my]4767-i complete perdition ! But [Tess]198-tess , [[my]4767-i coz]7532-my coz , as [I]4767-i used to call [you]198-tess , this is only [my]4767-i way of talking , and [you]198-tess must not look so horribly concerned . Of course [you]198-tess have done nothing except retain [your]198-tess pretty face and shapely figure . [I]4767-i saw it on the rick before [you]198-tess saw [me]4767-i - that tight pinafore - thing sets it off , and that wing - bonnet - [[you]198-tess field - girls]7533-you field - girls should never wear those bonnets if [you]198-tess wish to keep out of danger . "[4767-i] [He]4767-i regarded [her]4768-you silently for a few moments , and with a short cynical laugh resumed : " [I]4767-i believe that if [the bachelor - apostle]7534-the bachelor - apostle , whose deputy [I]4767-i thought [I]4767-i was , had been tempted by such a pretty face , [he]4767-i would have let go the plough for [her]4768-you sake as [I]4767-i do ! "[4767-i]

[Tess]198-tess attempted to expostulate , but at this juncture all [her]198-tess fluency failed [her]198-tess , and without heeding [he]4767-i added :

" Well , this paradise that [you]4768-you supply is perhaps as good as any other , after all . But to speak seriously , [Tess]198-tess . "[4767-i] [D'Urberville]230-d'urberville rose and came nearer , reclining sideways amid the sheaves , and resting upon [his]4767-i elbow . " Since [I]4767-i last saw [you]4768-you , [I]4767-i have been thinking of what [you]4768-you said that [HE]4767-i said . [I]4767-i have come to the conclusion that there does seem rather a want of common - sense in these threadbare old propositions ; how [I]4767-i could have been so fired by [poor Parson Clare]401-parson clare 's enthusiasm , and have gone so madly to work , transcending even [him]4767-i , [I]4767-i can not make out ! As for what [you]4768-you said last time , on the strength of [[your]4768-you wonderful husband]7535-your wonderful husband 's intelligence - whose name [you]4768-you have never told [me]4767-i - about having what [they]7536-they call an ethical system without any dogma , [I]4767-i do n't see [my]4767-i way to that at all . "[4767-i]

" Why , [you]4768-you can have the religion of loving - kindness and purity at least , if [you]4768-you ca n't have - what do [you]4768-you call it - dogma . "[230-d'urberville]

" O no ! [I]4767-i 'm [a different sort of fellow]7537-a different sort of fellow from that ! If there 's [nobody]754-nobody to say , ' Do this , and it will be a good thing for [you]4768-you after [you]4768-you are dead ; do that , and if will be a bad thing for [you]4768-you , ' [I]4767-i ca n't warm up . Hang it , [I]4767-i am not going to feel responsible for [my]4767-i deeds and passions if there 's [nobody to be responsible to]7539-nobody to be responsible to ; and if [I]4767-i were [you]4768-you , [[my]4767-i dear]6039-my dear , [I]4767-i would n't either ! "[4767-i]

[She]4769-me tried to argue , and tell [him]4770-you that [he]4770-you had mixed in [his]4770-you dull brain two matters , theology and morals , which in the primitive days of [mankind]1581-mankind had been quite distinct . But owing to [Angel Clare]284-clare 's reticence , to [her]4769-me absolute want of training , and to [her]4769-me being [a vessel of emotions rather than reasons]4772-a vessel of emotions rather than reasons , [she]4769-me could not get on .

" Well , never mind , "[4770-you] [he]4770-you resumed . " Here [I]4770-you am , [[my]4770-you love]6943-my love , as in the old times ! "[4770-you]

" Not as then - never as then - ' tis different ! "[4769-me] [she]4769-me entreated . " And there was never warmth with [me]4769-me ! O why did n't [you]4770-you keep [your]4770-you faith , if the loss of it has brought [you]4770-you to speak to [me]4769-me like this ! "[4769-me]

" Because [you]4770-you 've knocked it out of [me]4769-me ; so the evil be upon [your]4770-you sweet head ! [[Your]4770-you husband]6856-your husband little thought how [his]6856-your husband teaching would recoil upon [him]6856-your husband ! [She]4773-you could not get [her]4773-you morsels of food down [her]4773-you throat ; [her]4773-you lips were dry , and [she]4773-you was ready to choke . The voices and laughs of [the workfolk eating and drinking under the rick]4774-the workfolk eating and drinking under the rick came to [her]4773-you as if [they]4775-they were a quarter of a mile off .

" It is cruelty to [me]4773-you ! "[4773-you] [she]4773-you said . " How - how can [you]4776-i treat [me]4773-you to this talk , if [you]4776-i care ever so little for [me]4773-you ? "[4773-you]

" True , true , "[4776-i] [he]4776-i said , wincing a little . " [I]4776-i did not come to reproach [you]4773-you for [my]4776-i deeds . Do n't [you]4773-you know them , [Tess]198-tess ? - ' And [she]198-tess shall follow after [[her]198-tess lover]2598-her lover , but [she]198-tess shall not overtake [him]2598-her lover ; and [she]198-tess shall seek [him]2598-her lover , but shall not find [him]2598-her lover ; then shall [she]198-tess say , [I]4776-i will go and return to [[my]4776-i first husband]7547-my first husband ; for then was it better with [me]4776-i than now ! [Her]4777-her face had been rising to a dull crimson fire while [he]4778-his spoke ; but [she]4777-her did not answer .

" [You]4777-her have been the cause of [my]4778-his backsliding , "[4778-his] [he]4778-his continued , stretching [his]4778-his arm towards [her]4777-her waist ; " [you]4777-her should be willing to share it , and leave that mule [you]4777-her call [husband]3776-husband for ever . "[4778-his]

One of [her]4777-her leather gloves , which [she]4777-her had taken off to eat [her]4777-her skimmer - cake , lay in [her]4777-her lap , and without the slightest warning [she]4777-her passionately swung the glove by the gauntlet directly in [his]4778-his face . It was heavy and thick as [a warrior]4779-a warrior 's , and it struck [him]4778-his flat on the mouth . [Fancy]292-dumpling , fancy , lofty , mist might have regarded the act as the recrudescence of a trick in which [[her]4777-her armed progenitors]4780-her armed progenitors were not unpractised . [Alec]367-alec d'urberville fiercely started up from [his]4778-his reclining position . A scarlet oozing appeared where [her]4777-her blow had alighted , and in a moment the blood began dropping from [his]4778-his mouth upon the straw . But [he]4778-his soon controlled [himself]4778-his , calmly drew [his]4778-his handkerchief from [his]4778-his pocket , and mopped [his]4778-his bleeding lips .

[She]4777-her too had sprung up , but [she]4777-her sank down again . " Now , punish [me]4777-her ! "[4777-her] [she]4777-her said , turning up [her]4777-her eyes to [him]4778-his with the hopeless defiance of the sparrow 's gaze before [its captor]4781-its captor twists [its]4781-its captor neck . " Whip [me]4777-her , crush [me]4777-her ; [you]4778-his need not mind [those people under the rick]7550-those people under the rick ! [I]4777-her shall not cry out . Once [victim]7551-victim , always [victim]7551-victim - that 's the law ! "[4777-her]

" O no , no , [Tess]198-tess , "[4778-his] [he]4778-his said blandly . " [I]4778-his can make full allowance for this . " [You]4778-his did . "[4778-his]

" And [you]4778-his can not be . But remember one thing ! "[4778-his] [His]4778-his voice hardened as [his]4778-his temper got the better of [him]4778-his with the recollection of [his]4778-his sincerity in asking [her]4782-her and [her]4782-her present ingratitude , and [he]4778-his stepped across to [her]4782-her side and held [her]4782-her by the shoulders , so that [she]4782-her shook under [his]4778-his grasp . " Remember , [[my]4778-his lady]6239-my lady , [I]4778-his was [[your]4782-her master]7555-your master once ! [I]4778-his will be [[your]4782-her master]7555-your master again .
